email_body: Bob, The application for the variance states that I applied for a permit on October 29th and was rejected. Do the discussions with the building inspector constitute denial. Phillip -----Original Message----- From: "Robert W. Huntley, CFP" <wise.counsel@lpl.com>@ENRON Sent: Monday, November 12, 2001 11:45 AM To: Allen, Phillip K. Subject: word file as promised - Allen 8855 Merlin lttr.doc << File: Allen 8855 Merlin lttr.doc >>
